name: Andrews International
overview: Andrews International, Inc. provides security and risk mitigation services in the United States and internationally. Its services include uniformed security, personal protection, special event security, disaster and emergency response, and specialized training. The company provides consulting and investigation services in the areas of occupational fraud and abuse investigations, personal protection and threat assessments, security vulnerability and risk assessments, intellectual property protection, security management program audits and performance analysis, electronic security system design and operational integration, litigation support and expert witness testimony, and travel security intelligence and logistics management, as well as due diligence related to individuals, organizations, and issues. It offers its services to corporate entities, mid-sized companies, non-profit organizations, notable individuals, and governments. The company serves various markets, such as media and entertainment, financial institutions, energy critical infrastructure, shopping centers/malls, educational institutions, technology, residential estates, commercial real estate, pharmaceutical, industrial and manufacturing, and healthcare. Andrews International, Inc. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Valencia, California. It has additional offices in SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil; London, the United Kingdom; Tel Aviv, Israel; New Delhi, India; Singapore, Singapore, as well as in the United States.
